sentences.sContent: We shouldn't boggle at this opportunity to make a profit.
sentences.sContent_eng: We shouldn't boggle at this opportunity to make a profit.
sentences.sCn: 对这个赚钱的机会我们不应犹豫。

sentences.sContent: There is no reason why we should boggle at a capital gains tax.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is no reason why we should boggle at a capital gains tax.
sentences.sCn: 我们没有理由要对资本收益税犹豫不决。

synos.tran: 搞糟，弄坏；使……惊奇；使……困惑

remMethod.val: bog(使…陷入泥沼) + gle → 陷入泥沼， 会使人退缩 → 退缩
